name: Discipline!
wishText: Agami dinguli valo katut! R valo kore pora-sona koiren!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! Many many happy blah...
text3: Tarpor hothat egular kotha mone porlo!
text4: Vablam dekhi aj ki ki sekha jay!
text5Content: Aj na hole, por e abar alsemi laga pare!
replayText: Abar dekhte mon caile etai click kora paren!
